sentences.en: A largely Protestant nation that can trace its theological taproot to Martin Luther ought to know better.
sentences.cn: 作为一个主要由新教徒构成的国家，有必要了解到它的神学根源来自于马丁·路德。

sentences.en: Curiosity is the taproot of an intellectual life , the most valuable of our simian traits.
sentences.cn: 好奇是高智生命的根源，也是我们类人猿特征中最有价值的部分。

sentences.en: Taproot A persistent primary root that grows vertically downward.
sentences.cn: 直根:垂直向下生长的宿存主根.

sentences.en: The root system of the soybean consists of a taproot formed by the radicle.
sentences.cn: 大豆的根系包括由胚根形成的主根.

trans.tran_en: the large main root of a plant, from which smaller roots grow
